RxML.TEXT: <gender>Female</gender> <age>19-24</age> <treatment_length>1 to 6 months</treatment_length> <satisfaction>4</satisfaction> <effectiveness>5</effectiveness> <condition>Condition: Birth Control</condition> <comment>i've been on this for several months now and have had no problems with it thus far. The only thing that tends to happen is that i will randomly lightly bleed when i am not taking the iron pills. I don't have bad mood swings my hair does not fall out i have not gained or loss any weight. nothing.</comment>

SIDE_EFFECT.text: not gained or loss any weight
